The signal and the noise

The easiest way to make your first post is to edit this one. Go into /_posts/ and update the Hello World markdown file. For more instructions head over to the Jekyll Now repository on GitHub.

def heightToDelay(height,elevationAngle,reciever):
    path = 2*height/math.sin(math.radians(elevationAngle))
    delay = path*(reciever.CA_chip_frequency/reciever.speedOfLight)
    return(delay)
Written on January 20, 2015
